SEARCH
Package org.example.server

Interface ModelChangeListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface ModelChangeListener
The ModelChangeListener interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that wants to be notified of changes to the model. This is typically used in an MVC (Model-View-Controller) architecture where the view or controller needs to be updated when the model changes.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onModelChange(String username, String specificMessage, String generalMessage)
    Called when the model changes.
    void
    onModelGeneric(String generalMessage)
    Called to send a general message to all players.
    void
    onModelSpecific(String username, String specificMessage)
    Called to send a specific message to a specific player.

  • Method Details

    • onModelChange

      void onModelChange(String username, String specificMessage, String generalMessage) throws RemoteException
      Called when the model changes. This method notifies the listener of a change in the model that involves a specific player and also provides a general message for other players.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player who triggered the model change.
      specificMessage - The specific message for the player who triggered the change.
      generalMessage - The general message for all other players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI-related error occurs.

    • onModelSpecific

      void onModelSpecific(String username, String specificMessage) throws RemoteException
      Called to send a specific message to a specific player. This method notifies the listener with a message intended for a single player.
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player to whom the message is addressed.
      specificMessage - The specific message for the player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI-related error occurs.

    • onModelGeneric

      void onModelGeneric(String generalMessage) throws RemoteException
      Called to send a general message to all players. This method notifies the listener with a message intended for all players.
      Parameters:
      generalMessage - The general message for all players.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI-related error occurs.
